name: The Prison Experiment: Battle Royale
description: The Prison Experiment is a genre defining Battle Royale game with a twist. With several game modes to chose from you will never be left wanting more. From Classic Battle Royale & King of the cell block, we offer more than any other games in the genre.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 7400 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: i7 7700K Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
